scripts.dev: echo 'Use Live Server in VS Code'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:js: eslint *.js --fix || echo 'No JS files to lint'
scripts.lint:html: htmlhint *.html || echo 'No HTML files to lint'
scripts.lint:css: stylelint *.css --fix --allow-empty-input || echo 'No CSS files to lint'
